titleStmt.title: The creatures praysing God: or, The religion of dumbe creatures An example and argument for the stirring vp of our deuotion and for the confusion of atheisme. Benedicite omnia opera Domini Domino; laudate & superexaltate eum in secula. G.G.
titleStmt.author: Goodman, Godfrey, 1583-1656.

notesStmt.note: "Example and argument," is enclosed in curly brackets on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
